SLB,Schlumberger profit rises 20 pct as global drilling boomsUPDATE 1-Baker Hughes profit up on strong international drillingUPDATE 1-Schlumberger profit rises on strong drilling worldwideSchlumberger profit rises on strong drilling worldwideWRAPUP 2-Schlumberger, Baker top estimates with global drilling Oct 18 Increased oilfield activity in U.S. offshore waters and overseas gave a bigger-than-expected lift to profits at Schlumberger Ltd and Baker Hughes Inc , marking a clear divide with struggling smaller U.S. oil services firms.  WRAPUP 2-Schlumberger, Baker top estimates with global drilling Oct 18 Increased oilfield activity in U.S. offshore waters and overseas gave a bigger-than-expected lift to profits at Schlumberger Ltd and Baker Hughes Inc , marking a clear divide with struggling smaller U.S. oil services firms. Schlumberger Ltd , the world's largest oilfield services company, reported a better-than-expected 20 percent rise in quarterly profit as offshore drilling increased in North America and demand from the Middle East and Asia rose.WRAPUP 2-Schlumberger, Baker top estimates with global drilling Oct 18 Increased oilfield activity in U.S. offshore waters and overseas gave a bigger-than-expected lift to profits at Schlumberger Ltd and Baker Hughes Inc , marking a clear divide with struggling smaller U.S. oil services firms. WMT,India probe into Wal-Mart investment moves to central bank: sourcesWal-Mart offers to rehire employee fired for aiding attacked woman Oct 18 A Michigan man who was fired by Wal-Mart after he defended a woman who was attacked in a store parking lot during his meal break has been offered his job back, the company said on Friday.  Wal-Mart offers to rehire employee fired for aiding attacked woman Oct 18 A Michigan man who was fired by Wal-Mart after he defended a woman who was attacked in a store parking lot during his meal break has been offered his job back, the company said on Friday. MUMBAI/NEW DELHI An investigation by Indian authorities into whether Wal-Mart Stores Inc violated local investment rules in 2010 has been referred to the country's central bank, officials familiar with the matter said.Wal-Mart offers to rehire employee fired for aiding attacked woman Oct 18 A Michigan man who was fired by Wal-Mart after he defended a woman who was attacked in a store parking lot during his meal break has been offered his job back, the company said on Friday.  
YHOO,Yahoo CEO Mayer has advertisers' attention, but can she get their dollars?UPDATE 4-Google shares break $1,000 barrier as mobile pays off * Revenue surge makes analysts rethink stock price targets  UPDATE 4-Google shares break $1,000 barrier as mobile pays off * Revenue surge makes analysts rethink stock price targets NEW YORK/SAN FRANCISCO Three weeks ago, Yahoo Inc Chief Executive Marissa Mayer strode into a Manhattan hotel and was greeted like a rock star by hundreds of advertising executives who snapped pictures as she sat down for an interview with journalist Charlie Rose.UPDATE 4-Google shares break $1,000 barrier as mobile pays off * Revenue surge makes analysts rethink stock price targets
